column4: I have Dapper Drake and I have a little problem - When I am watching movies in Totem everything is okay, but in fullscreen it really sucks (sorry for my english, but I'm from Poland)
really sucks ?
could you be a little more specific ?
I don't know how to say this
Hmm, slow?
there's too little frames per second
ah ok. Do you have accel on?
have you also tried Mplayer?
I don't know, I have S3Savage8 graphic card
hehe I suck when it comes to non-nvidia cards, but may be you need to install DRI and libmesa
If I remember well those should  get Direct Rendering going.
I'll try install libmesa
I tried to use gstreamer in Totem instead xine, but it hadn't opened rmvb movie
am using totem-xine with the gstreamers codecs / libs installed
but usually I simply use Mplayer ..
in mplayer effect is the same like in Totem
then it's your direct rendering
how can I turn on Direct Rendering?
that is what I said earlier on. get DRI and Mesa working
Do I have to install any packages or configure something to enable DRI and Mesa?
yes.. I guess .. like I said though ... I such when it comes to non-nvidia cards
